## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-117">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-117">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-118">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-119">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-119">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-120">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-121">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-121">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-122">四个数字，以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-122">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-123">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-123">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-124">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-124">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-125">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-126">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-126">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-127">无格式：九个以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头的连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-127">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-128">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-129">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-130">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-131">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-131">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-132">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-132">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-133">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-133">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-134">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-134">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-135">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-135">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-153">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-153">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-154">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-155">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-155">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-156">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-157">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-157">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-158">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-158">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-159">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-159">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-160">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-160">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-161">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-162">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-162">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-164">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-166">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-166">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-167">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-167">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-168">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-168">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-180">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-180">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-181">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-182">包含或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的六到十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-182">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-183">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-184">帐号为 6 到 10 位数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-184">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-185">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-185">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-186">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-186">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-187">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-187">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-188">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-188">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-189">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-189">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-190">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-190">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-191">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-191">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-192">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-192">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-193">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-194">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-195">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-196">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-196">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-197">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-198">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-198">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-214">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-214">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-215">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-215">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-216">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-216">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-217">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-217">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-218">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-218">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-219">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-219">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-220">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-220">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-221">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-222">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-222">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-223">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-224">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-224">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-225">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-225">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-226">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-227">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-227">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-228">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-229">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-230">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-231">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-231">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-232">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-232">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-233">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-233">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-234">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-234">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-235">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-235">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-236">该函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-236">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-237">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-237">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-238">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-239">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-239">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-249">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-249">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-250">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-250">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-251">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-251">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-252">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-252">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-253">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-253">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-254">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-254">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-255">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-255">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-256">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-257">带分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-257">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-258">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-259">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-259">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-260">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-260">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-261">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-261">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-262">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-263">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-264">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-264">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-265">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-265">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-266">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-266">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-267">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-267">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-268">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-268">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-269">该函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-269">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-270">找到搜索Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-270">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-271">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-271">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-272">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-272">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-273">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-273">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-274">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-274">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-275">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-275">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-276">澳大利亚公司否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-276">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-277">澳大利亚公司否#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-277">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-278">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-278">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-279">澳大利亚公司否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-279">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-280">澳大利亚公司否#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-280">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-281">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-281">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-282">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-282">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-284">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-284">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-285">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-286">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-286">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-287">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-287">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-288">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-288">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-289">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-289">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-290">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-290">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-291">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-291">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-292">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-292">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-293">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-293">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-294">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-294">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-295">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-296">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-296">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-297">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-298">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-299">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-299">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-300">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-300">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-301">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-301">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-401">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-401">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-402">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-403">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-403">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-404">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-405">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-405">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-406">第一个数字的范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-406">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-407">第九个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-407">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-408">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-408">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-409">第 1 (个数字) 可选数字是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-409">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-410">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-411">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-411">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-412">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-413">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-413">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-414">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-414">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-415">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-415">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-416">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-416">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-417">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-417">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-418">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-418">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-419">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-419">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-420">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-420">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-421">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-421">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-422">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-422">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-423">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-423">information branch</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-428">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-428">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-429">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-429">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-430">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-430">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-431">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-431">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-432">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-432">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-433">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-434">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-434">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-435">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-436">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-437">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-437">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-438">找到来自Keyword_passport或Keyword_australia_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-438">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-472">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-472">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-474">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-474">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-475">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-476">8 到 9 个数字通常显示空格，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-476">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-477">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-477">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-478">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-478">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-479">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-480">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-481">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-481">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-482">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-483">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-483">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-484">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-485">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-486">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-486">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-487">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-487">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-488">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-489">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-490">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-490">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-491">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-491">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-492">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-492">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-493">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-493">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-494">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-494">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-495">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-495">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-496">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-496">withholding tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-497">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-497">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-498">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-498">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-499">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-499">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-500">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-500">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-501">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-501">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-502">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-502">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-503">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-503">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-504">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-504">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-505">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-506">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-506">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-507">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-508">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-508">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-509">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-509">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-510">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-510">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-637">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-637">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-638">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-638">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-639">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-639">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-640">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-640">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-641">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-641">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-642">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-642">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-643">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-643">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-645">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-645">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-647">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-647">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="cd049-648">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-648">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-649">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-649">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-650">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-651">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-651">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-652">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-653">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-653">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-654">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-654">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-655">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-655">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-656">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-656">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-657">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-657">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-661">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-661">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-662">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-663">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-663">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-664">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-665">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-665">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-666">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-666">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-667">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-667">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-668">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-668">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-669">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-670">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-670">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-671">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-672">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-672">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-673">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-673">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-674">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-674">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-675">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-675">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-676">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-676">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-677">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-677">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-678">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-678">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-699">奥地利社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-699">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-700">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-701">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-701">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-702">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-703">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-703">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-704">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-704">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-705">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-705">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-706">对应于 DD.2016 (日期的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-706">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-707">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-707">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-708">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-708">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-709">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-709">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-710">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-710">A DLP policy is has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-711">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-711">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-712">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-712">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-713">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-713">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-714">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-714">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-740">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-740">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-741">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-742">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-742">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-743">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-744">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-744">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-745">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-745">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-746">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-746">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-747">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-747">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-748">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-748">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-749">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-749">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-750">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-751">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-752">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-753">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-753">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-754">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-754">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-755">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-755">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-756">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-756">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-757">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-757">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-780">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-780">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-781">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-781">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-782">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-782">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-783">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-783">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-784">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-784">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-785">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-785">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-786">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-786">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-787">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-788">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-788">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-789">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-789">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-790">11 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-790">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-791">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-791">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-792">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-792">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-793">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-793">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-794">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-794">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-795">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-795">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-796">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-796">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-797">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-797">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-798">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-798">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-799">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-799">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-800">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-800">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-802">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-802">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-804">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-805">该Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-805">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-806">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-806">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-807">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-808">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-808">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-826">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-826">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-827">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-828">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟下面模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-828">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-829">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-829">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-830">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-830">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-831">3-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-831">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-832">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-832">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-833">86 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-833">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-834">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-834">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-835">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-836">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-836">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-837">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-838">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-838">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-839">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-839">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-840">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-840">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-855">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-855">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-856">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-856">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-857">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-857">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="cd049-858">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-858">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="cd049-859">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-859">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="cd049-860">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-860">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-861">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-861">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-862">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-862">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-863">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-863">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-864">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-864">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-865">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-865">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-866">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-866">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-867">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-867">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="cd049-868">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-868">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="cd049-869">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-869">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="cd049-870">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-870">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-871">1-300 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-871">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-872">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-872">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-873">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-873">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-874">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-874">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-875">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-875">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-876">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-876">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-877">a semicolon (;) ， quotation mark (") ， or apostrophe (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-877">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-878">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-879">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-879">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-880">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-881">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-881">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-882">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-882">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-883">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-883">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-913">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-913">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-937">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-937">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-938">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-941">字符串"userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-941">the string "userpwd="</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-947">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-948">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-949">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-949">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-964">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-964">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-965">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-965">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-966">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-966">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="cd049-967">net"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-967">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-968">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-968">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-969">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-969">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="cd049-970">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-970">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-971">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-971">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-972">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-972">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-973">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-973">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-974">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-974">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-975">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-975">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-976">43 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-976">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-977">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-977">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-978">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-979">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-980">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-981">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-982">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-982">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-983">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-983">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-998">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-998">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-999">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-999">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1000">字符串"sig"后跟下面模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1000">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1001">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1001">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1002">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1002">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1003">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1003">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1004">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1004">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1005">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1005">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1006">小写字母或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1006">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1007">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1007">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1008">不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的任何字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1008">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1009">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1010">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1010">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1012">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1012">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1013">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1013">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
