## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1053">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1053">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1054">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1055">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1055">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1057">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1057">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1058">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1059">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1060">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1061">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1062">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1062">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1063">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1063">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1064">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1064">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1065">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1066">86 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1066">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1067">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1067">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1068">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1069">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1069">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1070">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1071">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1072">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1072">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1073">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1073">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1074">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1074">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1092">Azure 存储帐户密钥 (通用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1092">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1093">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1094">86 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1094">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1095">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1095">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1096">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1096">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1097">86 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1097">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1098">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1098">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1099">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1100">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1100">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1101">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1102">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1102">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1103">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1103">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1104">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1104">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1105">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1106">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1106">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1107">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1108">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1108">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1109">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1110">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1110">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1111">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1112">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1113">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1113">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1114">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1114">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1247">比利时国家/区号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1247">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1248">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1249">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1249">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1250">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1251">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1251">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1252">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。MM.DD出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1252">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1253">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1253">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1254">三个连续的数字 (为男性的奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1254">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1255">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1255">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1256">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1256">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1257">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1258">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1258">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1259">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1260">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1260">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1261">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1261">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1262">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1262">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1263">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1263">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1264">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1264">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1265">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1265">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1266">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1266">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1325">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1325">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1326">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1327">两个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1327">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1328">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1329">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1329">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1330">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1330">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1331">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1331">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1332">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1332">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1333">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1333">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1334">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1334">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1335">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1335">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1336">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1336">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1337">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1338">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1338">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1339">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1339">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1363">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1363">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1364">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1364">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1365">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1365">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1366">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1366">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1367">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1367">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1368">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1368">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1369">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1369">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1370">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1371">12 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1371">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1372">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1373">12 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1373">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1374">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1374">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1375">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1375">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1376">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1376">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1377">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1377">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1378">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1378">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1379">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1379">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1380">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1380">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1381">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1381">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1382">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1383">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1383">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1384">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1385">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1385">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1386">该函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1386">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1387">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1387">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1388">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1389">该函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1389">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1401">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1401">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1402">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1403">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1403">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1404">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1405">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1405">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1406">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1406">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1407">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1407">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1408">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1408">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1409">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1409">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1410">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1410">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1411">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1411">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1412">两个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1412">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1413">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1413">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1414">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1414">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1416">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1418">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1419">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1419">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1420">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1420">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1421">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1421">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1422">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1422">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1423">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1423">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1424">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1424">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1430">收入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1430">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1431">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1431">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1432">一名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1432">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1433">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1433">Identificação</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1436">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1436">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1438">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1438">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1440">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1440">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1441">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1441">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1442">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1442">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1443">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1443">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1444">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1444">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1445">前八 (三个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1445">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1446">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1446">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1447">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1447">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1448">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1448">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1449">两个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1449">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1450">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1451">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1451">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1452">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1453">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1453">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1454">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1454">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1455">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1455">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1456">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1456">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1457">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1457">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1458">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1458">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1459">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1459">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1474">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1474">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1481">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1481">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1482">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1483">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1483">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1484">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1484">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1486">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1486">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1487">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1487">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1488">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1488">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1489">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1489">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1490">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1490">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1491">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1491">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1492">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1492">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1493">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1493">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1494">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1494">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1495">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1495">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1496">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1496">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1497">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1497">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1498">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1499">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1499">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1500">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1501">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1501">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1502">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1502">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1503">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1503">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1504">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1504">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1505">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1505">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1506">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1506">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1507">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1508">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1508">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1509">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1509">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1510">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1510">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1511">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1511">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1512">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1512">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1513">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1513">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1514">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1514">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1515">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1515">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1516">RG（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1516">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1517">RIC（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1517">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1518">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1518">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1519">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1520">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1520">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1521">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1522">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1522">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1523">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1524">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1524">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1525">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1526">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1527">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1527">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1528">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1528">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1662">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1663">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1663">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1664">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1665">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1665">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1666">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1666">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1667">对应于出生日期的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1667">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1668">对应于性别的一个数字：一个偶数（男性）和一个奇数（对于男性）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1668">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1669">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1669">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1670">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1671">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1671">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1672">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1673">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1673">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1674">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1674">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1675">找到一个  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1675">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1676">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1676">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1677">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1677">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1722">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1722">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1723">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1724">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1724">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1725">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1726">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1726">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1727">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1728">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1729">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1730">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1730">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1731">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1731">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1732">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1732">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1733">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1733">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1734">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1734">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1735">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1735">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1736">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1750">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1750">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1751">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1751">номер на паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1752">/否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1752">паспорт №</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1755">到期日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1755">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1756">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1756">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1758">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1758">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1760">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1760">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1761">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1761">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1762">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1762">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1763">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1763">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1764">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1764">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1765">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1765">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1766">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1766">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1767">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1768">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1769">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1770">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1770">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1771">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1771">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1772">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1772">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1773">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1773">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1774">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1774">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1775">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1775">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1776">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1776">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1800">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1800">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1801">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1802">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1802">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1803">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1804">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1804">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1805">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1806">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1807">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1808">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1808">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1809">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1809">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1810">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1810">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1811">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1811">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1947">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1947">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1948">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1949">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1949">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1950">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1951">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1951">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1952">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1952">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1953">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1953">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1954">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1954">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1955">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1955">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1956">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1956">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1957">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1957">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1958">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1958">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1959">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1959">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1960">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1960">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1961">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1961">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1962">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1962">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1963">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1963">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1964">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1964">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1965">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1965">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1966">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1966">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1967">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1967">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1968">残障</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1968">disability</span></span>

      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1969">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1969">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1970">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1971">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1971">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1972">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1972">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1973">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1973">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1975">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1975">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-1976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-1977">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1977">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1978">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1978">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-1979">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-1979">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2009">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2009">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2010">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2011">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2011">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2012">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2013">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2013">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2014">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2015">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2015">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2016">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2017">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2017">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2018">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2018">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2019">至少找到两个Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2019">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2052">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2052">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2054">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2054">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2055">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2056">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2056">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2057">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2057">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2058">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2058">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2059">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2059">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2060">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2060">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2061">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2061">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2062">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2062">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2063">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2064">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2064">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2065">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2066">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2066">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2067">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2067">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2068">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2068">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2069">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2069">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2070">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2070">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2071">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2071">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2072">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2072">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2073">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2073">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2074">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2074">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2075">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2075">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2076">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2076">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2101">智利身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2101">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2102">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2102">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2103">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2103">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2104">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2104">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2105">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2105">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2106">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2106">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2107">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2107">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2108">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2108">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2109">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2109">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2110">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2110">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2111">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2111">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2112">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2112">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2113">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2114">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2115">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2116">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2116">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2117">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2117">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2118">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2118">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2119">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2119">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2120">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2120">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2121">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2121">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2122">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
