## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2159">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2159">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2160">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2161">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2161">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2162">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2163">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2163">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2164">六个数字，即地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2164">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2165">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2165">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2166">三个数字，即订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2166">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2167">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2167">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2168">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2169">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2169">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2170">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2171">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2172">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2172">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2173">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2173">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2174">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2174">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2175">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2176">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2176">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2177">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2177">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2180">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2180">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2181">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2181">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2182">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2182">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2183">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2183">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2184">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2184">居民 身份证</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2190">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2190">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2192">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2192">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2193">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2194">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2194">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2195">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2196">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2196">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2197">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2198">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2198">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2199">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2199">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2200">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2200">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2201">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2201">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2202">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2202">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2203">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2203">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2204">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2205">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2205">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2206">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2206">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2207">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2467">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2467">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2468">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2468">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2469">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2469">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2470">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2470">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2471">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2471">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2472">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2473">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2473">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2474">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2475">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2476">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2476">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2477">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2477">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2601">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2601">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2602">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2602">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2603">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2604">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2604">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2605">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2606">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2606">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2607">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2608">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2609">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2610">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2611">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2611">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2612">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2612">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2643">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2643">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2645">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2645">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2647">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2647">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2648">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2649">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2649">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2650">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2651">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2651">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2652">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2653">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2654">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2654">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2655">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2656">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2656">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2657">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2657">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2675">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2675">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2676">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2677">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2677">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2678">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2679">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2679">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2680">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2680">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2681">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2681">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2682">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2683">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2683">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2684">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2685">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2685">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2686">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2687">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2687">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2688">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2689">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2689">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2690">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2690">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2691">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2691">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2722">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2722">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2723">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2724">12 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2724">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2725">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2726">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2726">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2727">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2728">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2729">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2730">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2730">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2731">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2731">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2732">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2732">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2857">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2857">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2858">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2858">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2859">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2859">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2860">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2860">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2861">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2861">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2862">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2862">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2863">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2863">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2864">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2865">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2865">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2867">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2867">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2868">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2868">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2869">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2869">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2870">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2870">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2871">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2872">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2872">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2873">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2873">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2874">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2875">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2875">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2876">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2876">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2877">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2877">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2878">kim karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2878">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2879">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2879">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2880">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2880">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2881">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2881">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2882">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2882">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2883">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2883">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2884">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2884">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2885">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2885">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2886">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2886">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2887">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2887">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2888">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2888">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2889">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2889">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2890">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2890">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2891">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2891">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2892">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2892">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2893">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2893">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2894">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2894">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2895">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2895">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2896">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2896">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2925">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2925">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2926">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2926">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2927">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2927">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2928">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2928">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2929">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2929">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2930">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2930">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2931">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2931">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2932">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2933">指定模式中八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2933">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2934">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2935">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2935">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2936">a "0" or "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2936">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2937">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2937">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2938">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2938">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2939">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2940">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2940">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2941">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2942">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2942">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2943">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2943">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2944">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2944">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2945">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2945">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2946">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2946">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2974">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2974">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2975">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2976">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2976">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2977">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2978">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2978">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2979">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2979">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2980">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2980">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2981">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2981">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2982">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2982">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2983">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2984">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2984">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-2985">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-2986">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2987">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2987">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-2988">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-2988">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3114">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3114">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3115">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3116">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3116">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3117">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3118">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3118">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3119">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3120">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3121">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3122">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3123">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3123">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3124">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3125">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3125">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3126">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3126">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3127">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3127">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3128">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3150">捷克语个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3150">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3152">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 十个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3152">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3153">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3154">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3154">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3155">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3155">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3156">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3156">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3157">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3157">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3158">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3158">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3159">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3159">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3160">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3160">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3161">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3161">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3162">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3162">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3163">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3163">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3164">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3164">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3165">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3165">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3166">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3166">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3167">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3167">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3168">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3168">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3169">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3169">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3170">该函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3170">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3171">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3171">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3218">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3218">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3219">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3219">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3220">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3220">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3221">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3221">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3222">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3222">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3223">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3224">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3224">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3225">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3226">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3227">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3227">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3228">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3352">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3352">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3353">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3354">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3354">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3355">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3356">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3356">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3357">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3358">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3358">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3359">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3360">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3361">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3361">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3362">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3363">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3363">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3364">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3364">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3365">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3365">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3366">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3366">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3386">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3386">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3388">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3388">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3390">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3390">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3391">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3391">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3392">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3392">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3393">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3393">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3394">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3395">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3395">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3396">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3397">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3398">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3398">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3399">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3399">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3400">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3400">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3401">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3402">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3402">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3403">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3403">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3475">犯罪管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3475">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3476">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3477">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3477">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3478">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3479">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3479">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3480">一个字母 (可能) 字母集不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3480">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3481">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3481">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3482">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3482">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3483">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3484">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3484">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3485">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3486">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3487">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3487">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3488">找到一个 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3488">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3489">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3489">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3490">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3491">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3491">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3492">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3492">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3493">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3493">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3494">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3494">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3495">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3495">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3496">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3496">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3497">非法强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3497">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3498">管制局</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3498">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3499">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3499">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3500">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3500">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3501">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3501">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3502">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3503">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3503">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3504">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3504">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3505">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3505">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3506">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3507">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3507">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3508">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3509">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3509">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3510">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3510">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3511">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3511">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3512">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3512">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3513">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3513">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3514">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3514">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3515">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3515">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3516">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3516">driverlicense</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3637">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3637">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3638">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3638">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3639">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3639">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3640">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3640">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3641">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3641">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3642">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3642">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3643">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3643">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3645">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3645">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3647">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3647">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3648">一个数字，对应于性生活和百年 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3648">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3649">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3649">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3650">三个数字，对应于一个序列号，分隔同一日期的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3650">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3651">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3651">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3652">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3653">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3653">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3654">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3655">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3655">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3656">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3656">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3657">找到一个  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3657">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3658">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3658">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3659">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3659">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3692">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3692">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3693">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3694">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3694">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3695">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3696">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3696">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3697">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3698">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3698">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3699">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3700">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3701">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3701">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3702">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3703">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3704">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3705">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3705">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3706">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
