## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3724">欧盟借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3724">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3725">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3726">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3726">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3727">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3728">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3728">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3729">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3730">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3730">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-3731">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-3732">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3732">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3733">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3733">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3734">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3734">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3735">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3735">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3736">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3736">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3737">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3737">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3738">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3738">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3739">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3739">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-3740">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-3740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4186">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4186">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4187">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4188">包含连字符的十个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4188">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4189">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4190">包含连字符的十个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4190">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4191">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4191">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4192">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4192">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4193">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4193">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4194">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4194">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4195">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4196">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4196">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4197">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4198">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4198">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4199">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4199">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4200">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4200">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4331">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4331">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4332">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4333">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4334">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4335">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4336">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4337">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4338">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4339">20 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4339">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4340">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4341">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4341">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4342">十位数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4342">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4343">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4343">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4344">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4344">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4345">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4345">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4346">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4346">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4347">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4347">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4348">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4348">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4349">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4349">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4350">找到搜索Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4350">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4368">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4368">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4370">六个数字加上一个字符，指示一个世纪加三个数字加上一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4370">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4371">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4372">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4372">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4373">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4373">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4374">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4374">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4375">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4375">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4376">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4376">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4377">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4378">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4378">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4379">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4380">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4380">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4381">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4381">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4382">找到Keyword_finnish_national_id关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4382">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4383">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4383">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4384">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4384">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4385">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4385">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4386">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4386">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4435">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4435">Finland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4436">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4436">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4437">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4437">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4438">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4438">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4439">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4439">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4440">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4440">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4441">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4441">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4442">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4443">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4443">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4444">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4445">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4446">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4446">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4447">找到来自Keywords_eu_passport_number_common或Keyword_finland_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4447">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4468">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4468">France driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4470">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4470">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4472">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4472">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4473">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4474">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4474">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4475">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4476">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4476">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4477">函数Func_french_drivers_license找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4477">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4478">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4478">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4605">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4605">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4606">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4606">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4607">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4607">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4608">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4608">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4609">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4609">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4610">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4610">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4611">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4611">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4612">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4613">21 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4613">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4614">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4615">21 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4615">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4616">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4616">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4617">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4617">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4618">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4618">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4619">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4619">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4620">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4620">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4621">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4622">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4622">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4623">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4624">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4624">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4625">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4625">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4626">找到Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4626">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4627">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4627">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4628">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4628">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4629">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4629">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4630">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4630">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4631">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4631">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4632">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4632">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4633">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4634">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4634">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4635">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4636">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4636">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4637">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4638">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4639">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4640">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4640">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4641">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4641">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4642">找到搜索Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4642">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4643">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4643">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4644">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4644">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4645">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4645">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4647">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4647">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4648">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4648">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4649">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4649">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4650">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4650">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4651">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4651">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4652">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4652">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4653">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4653">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4654">numéro d'assurance mal访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4654">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4656">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4656">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4657">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4657">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4659">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4659">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4661">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4661">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4662">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4662">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4663">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4663">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4664">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4664">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4665">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4665">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4666">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4666">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4667">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4667">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4668">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4668">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4669">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4669">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4670">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4670">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4671">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4671">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4672">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4672">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4673">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4673">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4674">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4674">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4675">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4675">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4676">Passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4676">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4677">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4677">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4678">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4678">Passportno</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4691">法国社会保险号码 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4691">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4692">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4692">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4693">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4694">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4694">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4695">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4696">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4696">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4697">13 个数字后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4697">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4698">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4698">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4699">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4699">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4700">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4700">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4701">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4701">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4702">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4702">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4703">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4703">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4704">该函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4704">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4705">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4705">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4706">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4706">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4707">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4708">该函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4708">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4709">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4709">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4710">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4736">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4736">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4737">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4738">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4738">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4739">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4740">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4740">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4741">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4741">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4742">1 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4742">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4743">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4743">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4744">2 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4744">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4745">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4745">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4746">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4746">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4747">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4747">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4748">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4748">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4749">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4749">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4750">3 个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4750">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4751">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4751">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4752">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4752">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4753">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4753">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4754">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4754">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4755">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4755">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4756">找到一个  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4756">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4757">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4757">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4758">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4758">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4778">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4778">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4779">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4779">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4780">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4780">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4781">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4781">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4782">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4782">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4783">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4783">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4784">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4784">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4785">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4786">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4786">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4787">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4788">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4788">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4789">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4789">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4790">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4790">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4791">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4791">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4792">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4792">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4793">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4793">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4794">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4794">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4795">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4795">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4796">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4796">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4797">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4797">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4798">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4799">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4800">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4801">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4801">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4802">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4802">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4803">找到搜索Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4803">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4804">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4804">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4805">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4805">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4808">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4808">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4812">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur sur surur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4812">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4818">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4818">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4820">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4820">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4822">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4822">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4823">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4823">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4824">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4824">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4825">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4825">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4826">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4826">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4827">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4827">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4828">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4829">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4830">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4831">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4831">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4832">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4832">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4833">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4833">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4834">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4834">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4983">德国身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4983">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4984">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4985">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4985">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4986">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4986">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4987">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4987">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4988">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4988">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4989">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4989">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4990">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4990">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4991">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4991">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4992">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4992">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4993">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4993">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4994">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4994">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4995">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4995">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-4996">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4996">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4997">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4997">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-4998">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4998">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-4999">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-4999">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5000">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5000">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5001">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5001">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5002">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5002">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5003">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5003">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5004">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5004">identifikation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5006">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5006">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5007">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5007">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5008">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5008">id-nummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5012">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5012">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5013">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5013">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5014">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5014">Germany passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5016">十个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5016">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5018">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5018">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5019">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5019">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5020">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5020">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5021">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5021">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5022">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5022">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5023">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5024">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5024">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5025">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5026">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5026">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5027">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5027">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5028">找到或 `Keyword_german_passport` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5028">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5029">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5030">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5030">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5031">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5031">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5032">找到或 `Keyword_german_passport` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5032">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5033">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5033">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5034">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5034">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5038">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5038">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5039">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5039">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5040">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5040">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5041">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5041">Passnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5042">reisepsse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5042">reisepässe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5043">passeport no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5043">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5044">passeport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5044">passeport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5046">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5046">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5056">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5056">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5057">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5058">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5058">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5059">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5060">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5060">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5061">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5061">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5062">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5062">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5063">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5063">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5064">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5064">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5065">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5065">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5066">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5066">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5067">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5067">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5068">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5068">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5069">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5070">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5070">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5071">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5072">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5072">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5073">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5073">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5074">找到一个  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5074">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5075">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5075">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5076">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5076">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5102">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5102">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5103">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5103">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5104">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5104">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5105">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5105">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5106">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5106">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5107">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5107">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5108">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5108">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5110">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5110">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5111">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5112">11 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5112">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5113">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5113">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5114">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5114">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5115">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5115">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5116">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5116">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5117">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5117">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5118">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5118">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5119">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5119">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5120">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5120">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5121">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5122">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5122">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5123">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5124">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5124">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5125">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5125">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5126">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5126">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5127">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5127">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5128">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5128">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5130">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5130">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5138">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5138">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5140">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5140">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5141">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5142">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5142">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5143">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5144">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5144">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5145">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5146">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5146">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5147">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5147">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5148">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5148">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5273">Δίπλωμα οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5273">Δίπλωμα οδήγησης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5274">希腊国家身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5274">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5276">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5276">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5277">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5278">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5278">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5279">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5279">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5280">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5280">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5281">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5281">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5282">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5282">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5283">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5283">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5284">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5284">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5285">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5285">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5286">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5286">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5287">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5287">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5288">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5288">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5289">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5289">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5290">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5290">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5291">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5291">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5292">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5292">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5293">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5293">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5294">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5294">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5295">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5295">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5296">希腊语 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5296">greek id</span></span>
