## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5304">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5304">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5305">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5305">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5306">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5306">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5307">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5307">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5308">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5308">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5309">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5310">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5310">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5311">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5312">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5312">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5313">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5313">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5314">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5314">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5315">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 或找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5315">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5316">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5316">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5317">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5317">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5318">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5318">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5335">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5335">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5336">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5336">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5337">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5337">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5338">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5338">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5339">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5339">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5340">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5340">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5341">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5341">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5342">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5342">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5343">无空格和分隔符的十一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5343">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5344">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5344">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5345">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5345">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5346">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5346">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5347">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5347">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5348">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5349">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5349">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5350">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5351">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5351">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5352">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5352">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5353">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5353">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5354">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5354">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5355">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5355">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5366">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5366">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5367">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5367">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5368">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5368">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5369">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5369">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5370">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5370">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5371">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5371">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5372">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5372">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5373">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5373">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5374">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5374">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5375">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5375">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5376">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5376">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5377">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5378">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5378">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5379">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5380">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5380">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5381">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5381">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5382">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5382">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5411">香港身份证号码 (HKID) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5411">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5412">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5412">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5413">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5413">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5414">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5414">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5415">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5415">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5416">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5416">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5417">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5417">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5418">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5418">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5419">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5420">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5420">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5421">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5422">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5422">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5423">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5423">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5424">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5424">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5425">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5425">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5426">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5426">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5427">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5427">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5428">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5428">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5468">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5468">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5470">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5470">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5472">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5472">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5473">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5473">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5474">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5474">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5475">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5476">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5476">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5477">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5478">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5479">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5479">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5480">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5480">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5605">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5605">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5606">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5606">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5607">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5607">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5608">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5608">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5609">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5609">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5610">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5610">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5611">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5611">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5612">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5613">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5613">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5614">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5615">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5615">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5616">1 个数字对应于性别 (1-男性、2- 男性，对于在 1900 之前生活或具有双重公民关系公民的公民，也可以) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5616">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5617">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5617">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5618">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5618">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5619">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5619">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5620">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5621">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5621">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5622">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5623">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5623">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5624">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5624">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5625">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5625">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5626">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5627">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5627">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5633">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5633">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5634">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5634">ig.</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5638">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5638">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5639">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5640">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5640">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5641">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5642">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5642">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5643">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5644">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5644">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5645">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5646">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5646">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5647">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5647">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5648">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5648">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5649">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YY (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5649">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5650">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5650">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5651">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5651">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5652">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5652">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5669">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5669">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5670">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5671">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5671">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5672">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5673">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5673">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5674">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5675">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5675">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5676">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5677">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5677">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5678">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5678">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5679">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5679">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5680">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5680">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5681">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5681">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5701">匈牙利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5701">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5702">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5702">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5703">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5703">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5704">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5704">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5705">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5705">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5706">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5706">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5707">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5707">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5708">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5709">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5709">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5710">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5711">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5711">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5712">一个数字，必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5712">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5713">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5713">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5714">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5714">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5715">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5716">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5716">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5717">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5718">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5719">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5719">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5720">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5720">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5721">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5722">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5722">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5748">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5748">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5749">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5749">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5750">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5750">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5751">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5751">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5752">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5752">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5753">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5753">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5754">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5754">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5755">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5756">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5756">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5757">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5758">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5758">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5759">2 个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5759">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5760">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5760">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5761">8 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5761">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5762">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5763">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5763">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5764">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5765">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5765">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5766">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5766">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5767">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5767">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5768">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5768">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5769">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5769">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5772">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5772">vat</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5774">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5774">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5775">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5775">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5776">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5776">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5777">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5777">tax no.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5780">általcioos forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5780">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5781">hozzáadottottottték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5781">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5782">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5782">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5783">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5783">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5784">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5785">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5785">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5786">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5787">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5787">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5788">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5788">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5789">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5789">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5790">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5790">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5791">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5791">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5792">字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5792">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5793">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5793">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5794">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5794">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5795">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5795">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5796">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5796">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5797">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5797">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5798">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5798">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5799">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5799">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5800">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5800">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5801">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5801">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5802">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5802">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5803">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5803">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5804">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5804">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5805">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5805">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5807">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5807">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5809">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5809">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5810">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5810">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5811">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5811">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5812">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5812">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5813">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5813">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5814">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5814">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5815">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5815">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5816">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5817">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5817">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5818">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5819">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5819">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5820">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5820">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5821">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5821">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5822">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5822">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5823">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5823">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5824">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5824">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5825">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5825">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5826">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5826">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5827">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5827">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5828">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5828">aadhaar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5830">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5830">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5831">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5831">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5832">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5832">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5833">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5833">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5834">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5834">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5835">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5836">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5836">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5837">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5837">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5838">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5838">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5839">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5839">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5840">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5840">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5841">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5841">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5842">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5842">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5843">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5843">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5844">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5844">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5845">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5845">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5846">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5846">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5847">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5847">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5848">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5848">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5849">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5849">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5850">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5850">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5851">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5851">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5852">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5852">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5853">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5853">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5854">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5854">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5855">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5855">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5856">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5856">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5857">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5857">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5858">IBAN 服务 (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5858">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5859">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5860">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5860">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5861">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5862">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5862">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5863">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5863">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5864">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5864">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5865">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5865">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5866">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5866">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5869">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5869">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5870">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5871">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5872">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5873">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5873">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5874">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5874">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5875">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5876">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5876">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5877">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5877">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5878">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5878">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5879">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5880">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5880">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5881">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5882">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5882">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5883">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5884">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5884">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5885">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5886">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5886">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5887">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5887">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5888">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5888">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5889">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5890">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5890">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5891">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5891">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5892">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5892">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5893">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5893">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5894">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5894">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5895">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5895">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5896">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5896">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5897">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5897">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5898">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5898">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5899">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5899">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5900">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5900">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5901">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5901">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5902">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5902">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5903">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5903">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5904">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5904">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5905">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5905">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5906">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5906">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5907">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5907">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5908">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5908">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5909">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5909">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5910">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5910">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5911">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5911">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5912">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5912">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5913">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5913">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5914">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5914">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5915">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5915">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5916">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5916">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5917">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5917">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5918">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5918">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5919"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5919">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5920">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5920">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5921">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5922">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5923">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5924">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5924">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5925">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5925">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5926">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5926">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5927">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5927">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5928">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5928">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5929">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5929">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5930">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5930">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5931">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5931">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5932">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5932">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5933">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5933">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5934">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5934">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5935">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5935">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5936">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5936">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5937">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5937">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5938">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5938">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5939">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5939">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5940">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5940">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5941">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5941">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5942">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5942">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5943">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5943">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5944">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5944">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5945">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5945">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5946">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5946">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5947">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5947">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5948">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5948">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-5949">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5949">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-5950">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5950">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5951">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5951">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-5952">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-5952">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6076">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6076">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6078">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6078">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6080">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6080">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6081">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6081">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6082">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6082">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6083">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6084">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6084">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6085">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6086">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6087">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6087">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6088">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6088">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6089">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6089">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6090">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6091">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6091">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6092">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6092">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
