## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6116">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6116">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6117">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6117">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6118">旧格式 (2012 年 12 月 31 日) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6118">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6119">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6119">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6120">新格式 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6120">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6121">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6121">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6122">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6123">旧格式 (2012 年 12 月 31 日) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6123">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6124">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6124">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6125">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6125">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6126">新格式 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6126">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6127">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6127">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6128">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6128">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6129">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6129">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6130">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6131">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6131">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6132">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6133">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6133">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6134">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6134">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6135">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6135">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6136">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6137">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6137">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6138">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6138">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6139">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6184">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6184">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6185">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6185">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6186">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6186">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6187">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6187">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6188">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6188">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6189">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6189">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6190">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6190">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6191">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6191">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6192">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6192">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6193">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6193">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6194">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6194">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6195">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6195">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6196">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6197">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6197">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6198">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6199">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6199">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6200">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6200">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6201">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6201">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6208">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6208">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6209">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6210">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6210">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6211">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6212">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6212">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6213">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6214">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6215">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6216">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6216">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6217">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6217">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6218">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6218">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6219">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6238">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6238">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6239">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6240">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6240">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6241">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6242">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6242">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6243">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6243">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6244">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6244">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6245">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6245">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6246">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6246">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6250">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6251">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6251">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6252">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6252">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6260">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6260">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6261">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6262">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6263">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6264">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6265">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6266">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6268">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6268">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6270">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6270">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6271">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6271">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6272">三个字母，分别对应于名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6272">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6273">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6273">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6274">一个字母，对应于出生日期月份中的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，January 是 A，十月是 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6274">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6275">与出生日期对应的两位数 -为了区分性别，将 40 添加到性别的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6275">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6276">四个数字，对应于某人所 (的国家/地区代码所特有的地区代码，用于) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6276">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6277">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6277">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6278">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6279">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6279">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6280">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6281">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6282">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6282">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6283">找到一个  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6283">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6284">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6285">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6285">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6320">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6320">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6321">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6322">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6322">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6323">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6323">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6324">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6324">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6325">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6325">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6326">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6326">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6327">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6327">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6328">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6328">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6329">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6329">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6330">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6330">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6331">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6331">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6332">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6333">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6333">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6334">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6335">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6335">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6336">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6360">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6360">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6361">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6361">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6362">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6362">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6363">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6363">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6364">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6364">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6365">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6365">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6366">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6366">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6367">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6368">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6368">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6369">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6370">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6370">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6371">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6371">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6372">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6372">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6373">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6373">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6374">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6374">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6375">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6376">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6376">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6377">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6378">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6378">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6379">该函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6379">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6380">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6380">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6381">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6382">该函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6382">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6390">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6390">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6391">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6391">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6392">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6392">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6393">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6393">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6394">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6394">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6395">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6395">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6396">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6396">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6397">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6397">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6398">可选 (或短) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6398">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6399">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6399">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6400">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6401">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6401">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6402">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6403">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6404">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6404">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6405">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6405">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6406">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6406">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6407">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6407">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6408">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6408">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6409">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6409">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6410">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6410">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6411">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6411">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6458">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6458">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6459">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6460">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6460">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6461">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6462">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6462">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6463">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6464">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6464">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6465">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6466">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6466">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6467">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6467">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6468">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6468">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6506">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6506">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6507">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6507">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6508">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6508">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6509">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6509">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6510">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6510">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6511">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6511">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6512">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6512">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6513">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6514">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6514">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6515">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6516">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6516">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6517">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6517">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6518">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6518">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6519">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6520">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6520">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6521">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6522">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6522">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6523">该函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6523">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6524">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6524">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6525">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6526">该函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6526">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6528">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6528">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6539">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6539">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6540">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6540">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6541">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6541">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6542">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6542">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6543">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6543">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6544">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6544">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6545">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6545">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6546">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6547">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6547">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6548">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6548">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6549">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6549">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6550">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6550">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6551">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6551">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6552">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6552">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6553">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6553">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6554">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6554">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6555">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6556">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6556">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6557">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6558">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6559">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6559">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6560">找到搜索Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6560">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6561">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6561">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6562">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6562">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6564">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6564">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6567">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6567">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6568">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6568">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6569">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6569">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6570">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6570">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6571">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6571">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6572">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6572">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6573">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6573">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6574">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6574">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6575">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6575">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6576">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6576">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6577">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6577">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6578">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6578">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6579">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6579">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6580">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6581">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6582">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6583">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6583">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6584">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6584">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6585">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6585">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6602">日本居民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6602">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6603">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6604">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6604">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6605">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6606">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6606">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6607">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6607">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6608">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6608">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6609">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6609">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6610">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6611">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6611">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6612">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6613">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6613">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6614">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6614">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6615">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6615">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6616">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6616">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6617">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6617">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6624">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6624">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6625">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6626">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6626">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6627">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6628">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6628">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6629">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6629">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6630">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6630">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6631">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6631">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6632">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6632">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6633">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6633">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6634">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6634">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6635">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6635">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6636">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6636">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6637">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6637">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6638">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6638">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6639">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6639">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6640">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6640">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6641">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6641">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6642">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6642">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6643">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6643">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6644">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6644">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6645">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6645">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6646">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6646">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6647">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6647">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6648">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6648">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6649">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6649">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6650">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6650">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6651">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6651">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6652">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6652">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6653">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6653">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6654">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6654">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6655">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6655">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6656">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6657">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6658">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6659">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6659">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6660">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6660">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6661">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6661">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6662">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6662">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6663">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6663">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6664">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6664">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6681">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6681">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6682">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6682">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6685">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6685">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6686">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6687">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6687">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6688">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6689">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6689">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6690">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6690">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6691">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6691">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6692">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6693">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6693">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6694">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6695">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6696">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6696">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6697">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6697">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6822">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6822">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6823">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6823">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6824">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6824">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6825">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6825">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6826">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6826">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6827">11 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6827">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6828">对应于 DD.2016 (日期的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6828">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6829">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6829">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6830">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"，"1"表示 20 世纪，"2"对应于 21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6830">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6831">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6831">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6832">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6832">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6833">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6833">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6834">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6834">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6835">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6835">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6836">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6837">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6837">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6838">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6839">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6840">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6840">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6841">找到一个  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6841">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6842">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6843">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6843">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6906">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6906">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6907">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6908">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6908">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6909">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6910">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6910">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6911">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6911">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6912">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6912">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6913">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6914">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6914">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6915">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6916">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6916">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6917">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6917">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6918">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6918">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6919">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6919">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6920">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6921">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6921">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6922">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6922">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6945">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6945">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6946">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6946">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6947">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6947">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6948">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6948">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6949">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6949">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6950">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6950">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6951">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6951">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-6952">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6952">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-6953">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6953">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6954">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6954">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-6955">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-6955">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7080">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7080">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7081">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7081">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7082">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7082">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7083">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7083">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7084">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7084">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7085">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7085">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7086">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7086">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7087">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7088">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7088">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7089">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7090">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7090">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7091">1 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7091">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7092">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7092">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7093">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7093">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7094">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7094">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7095">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7096">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7096">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7097">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7098">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7098">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7099">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7099">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7100">找到一个  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7100">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7101">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7101">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7102">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7102">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
