## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7137">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7137">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7138">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7139">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7139">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7140">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7141">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7141">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7142">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7143">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7143">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7144">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7145">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7146">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7146">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7147">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7147">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7148">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7148">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7149">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7149">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7150">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7150">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7151">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7151">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7171">都明网驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7171">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7172">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7173">不带空格和分隔符的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7173">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7174">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7175">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7175">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7176">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7177">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7177">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7178">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7179">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7179">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7180">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7180">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7181">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7181">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7305"> (布尔自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7305">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7306">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7306">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7307">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7307">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7308">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7308">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7309">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7309">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7310">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7310">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7311">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7311">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7312">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7312">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7313">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7313">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7314">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7314">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7315">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7315">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7316">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7316">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7317">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7317">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7318">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7318">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7319">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7319">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7320">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7320">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7321">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7321">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7322">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7322">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7323">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7323">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7324">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7325">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7325">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7348">比塞明卡护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7348">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7349">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7350">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7350">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7351">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7352">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7352">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7353">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7354">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7355">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7356">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7356">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7357">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7358">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7359">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7359">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7360">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7360">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7361">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7361">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7362">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7375">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7375">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7394"> (非自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7394">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7395">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7395">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7396">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7396">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7397">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7397">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7398">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7398">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7399">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7399">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7400">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7400">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7401">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7401">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7402">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7402">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7403">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7403">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7404">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7404">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7405">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7405">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7406">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7406">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7407">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7408">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7408">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7409">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7410">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7410">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7411">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7411">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7412">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7412">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7413">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7414">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7414">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7454">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7454">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7456">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7456">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7458">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7458">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7459">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7459">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7460">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7460">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7461">双字母的出生日期代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7461">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7462">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7462">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7463">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7463">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7464">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7464">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7465">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7466">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7466">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7467">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7468">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7468">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7469">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7469">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7470">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7470">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7497">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7497">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7498">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7499">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7499">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7500">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7501">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7501">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7502">两个字符 (或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7502">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7503">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7503">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7504">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7504">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7505">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7505">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7506">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7506">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7507">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7508">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7509">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7510">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7511">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7511">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7512">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7638">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7638">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7639">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7639">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7640">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7640">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7641">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7641">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7642">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7642">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7643">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7644">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7644">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7645">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7646">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7646">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7647">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7647">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7648">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7648">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7649">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7649">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7650">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7650">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7651">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7651">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7652">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7652">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7653">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7653">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7654">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7654">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7655">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7655">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7656">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7656">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7662">kodiċi数字个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7662">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7665">numru ta 'identifkuzzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7665">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7673">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7673">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7675">不带空格或分隔符的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7675">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7676">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7677">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7677">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7678">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7679">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7679">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7680">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7681">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7681">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7682">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7682">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7683">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7683">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7684">找到一个 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7684">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7685">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7685">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7686">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7686">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7687">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7687">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7707">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7707">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7708">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7709">对于马耳他语的公民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7709">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7710">指定模式中七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7710">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7711">非马耳他语国家/省和马耳他实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7711">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7712">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7712">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7713">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7714">马耳他语：七位数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7714">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7715">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7715">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7716">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7716">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7717">非马耳他语和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7717">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7718">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7718">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7719">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7720">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7720">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7721">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7722">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7723">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7723">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7724">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7724">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7725">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7725">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7726">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7726">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7727">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7727">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7728">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7728">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7729">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7729">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7730">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7730">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7731">identifident numru tal-jett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7731">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7732">kodiċi数字个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7732">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7733">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7733">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7734">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7734">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7735">numru ta 'identifkuzzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7735">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7736">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7736">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7737">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7737">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7759">荷兰公民服务号码 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7759">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7760">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7761">包含可选空格的八九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7761">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7762">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7762">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7763">八九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7763">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7764">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7764">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7765">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7765">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7766">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7766">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7767">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7767">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7768">两位三位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7768">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7769">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7769">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7770">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7770">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7771">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7771">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7772">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7772">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7773">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7773">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7774">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7774">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7775">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7799">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7799">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7800">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7801">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7801">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7802">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7803">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7803">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7805">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7805">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7807">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7808">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7808">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7809">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7937">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7937">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7939">无空格或分隔符的九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7939">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7941">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7941">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7942">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7943">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7943">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7944">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7945">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7946">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7946">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7947">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7948">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7948">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7949">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7950">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7950">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7951">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7951">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7969">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7969">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7970">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7970">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7971">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7971">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7972">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7972">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7973">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7973">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7974">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7974">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7975">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7975">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7976">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7977">不带空格或分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7977">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7978">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7978">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7979">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7979">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7981">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7981">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-7982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7983">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7984">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7984">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7985">找到一个  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7985">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-7986">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7986">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-7987">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-7987">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8025">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8025">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8026">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8026">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8027">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8027">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8028">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8028">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8029">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8029">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8030">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8030">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8031">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8031">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8032">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8032">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8033">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8033">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8034">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8034">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8035">14 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8035">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8036">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8036">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8037">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8037">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8038">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8038">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8039">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8039">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8040">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8040">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8041">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8041">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8042">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8042">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8043">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8043">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8044">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8044">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8045">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8045">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8046">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8046">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8047">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8047">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8048">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8048">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8049">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8049">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8050">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8050">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8059">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8059">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8060">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8060">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8061">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8061">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8062">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8062">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8063">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8063">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8064">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8064">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8065">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8065">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8066">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8066">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8067">带可选分隔符的 14 到 16 个数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8067">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8068">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8069">带可选分隔符的 14 到 16 个数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8069">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8070">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8070">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8071">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8071">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8072">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8072">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8073">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8073">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8074">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8074">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8075">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8075">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8076">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8076">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8077">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8077">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8078">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8079">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8079">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8080">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8081">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8081">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8082">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8082">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8083">找到搜索Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8083">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8084">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8084">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8085">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8085">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8100">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8100">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8104">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8104">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8105">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8105">six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8107">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8108">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8109">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8110">该函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8110">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8111">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8111">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8112">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8112">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8113">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8113">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8180">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8180">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8181">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8181">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8182">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8182">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8183">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8183">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8184">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8184">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8185">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8185">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8186">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8186">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8187">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8188">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8188">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8189">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8190">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8190">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8191">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8191">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8192">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8192">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8193">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8193">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8194">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8194">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8195">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8195">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8196">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8197">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8197">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8198">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8199">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8199">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8200">该函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8200">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8201">找到搜索Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8201">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8202">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8202">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8203">该函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8203">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8204">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8204">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8205">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8205">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8206">否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8206">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8207">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8207">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8208">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8208">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8209">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8209">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8210">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8210">ird number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8212">新西兰医疗局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8212">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8214">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8214">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8215">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8215">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8216">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8216">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8217">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8217">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8218">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8218">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8220">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8222">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8223">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8223">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8224">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8224">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8225">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8226">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8227">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8227">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8228">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8228">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8229">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8229">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8230">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8230">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>
