## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8242">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8242">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8243">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8243">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8244">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8244">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8245">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8245">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8246">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8246">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8247">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8247">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8248">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8248">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8249">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8249">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8250">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8250">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8251">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8251">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8252">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8252">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8253">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8253">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8254">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8254">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8255">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8255">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8256">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8256">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8257">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8257">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8258">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8258">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8259">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8259">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8260">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8260">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8261">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8261">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8262">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8262">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8263">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8263">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8264">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8264">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8265">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8265">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8266">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8266">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8267">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8267">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8268">社交发展#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8268">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8269">social 40#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8269">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8270">social no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8270">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8271">社交4004</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8271">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8272">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8272">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8273">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8273">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8274">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8275">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8275">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8276">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8277">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8277">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8278">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8278">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8279">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8279">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8280">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8280">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8281">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8282">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8282">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8283">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8284">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8285">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8285">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8286">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8286">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8287">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8287">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8288">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8288">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8289">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8289">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8290">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8291">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8291">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8292">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8292">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8293">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8293">Personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8295">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8295">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8296">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8296">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8297">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8297">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8298">Fselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8298">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8299">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8299">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8300">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8301">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8301">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8302">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8303">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8303">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8304">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8304">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8305">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8305">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8306">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8306">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8307">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8307">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8308">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8308">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8309">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8310">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8310">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8311">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8312">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8312">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8313">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8313">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8314">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8314">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8315">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8315">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8316">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8316">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8317">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8317">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8318">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8318">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8319">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8319">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8320">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8320">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8321">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8321">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8322">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8323">14 个数字，包含 2 个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8323">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8324">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8325">14 个数字和 2 个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8325">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8326">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8326">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8327">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8327">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8328">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8328">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8329">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8329">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8330">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8330">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8331">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8332">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8333">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8334">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8335">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8335">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8336">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8459">prawa jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8459">prawa jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8460">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8460">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8461">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8462">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8462">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8463">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8464">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8464">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8465">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8466">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8466">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8467">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8468">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8468">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8469">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8469">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8470">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8470">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8471">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8471">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8472">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8472">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8473">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8473">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8482">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8482">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8484">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8484">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8485">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8486">6 个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8486">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8487">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8487">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8488">1 个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8488">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8489">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8490">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8490">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8491">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8492">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8492">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8493">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8493">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8494">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8494">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8495">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8495">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8496">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8496">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8497">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8497">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8498">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8498">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8500">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8500">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8501">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8501">dowód osobisty</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8503">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8503">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8504">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8504">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8505">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8505">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8506">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8506">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8507">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8507">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8508">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8508">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8509">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8509">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8510">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8510">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8511">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8511">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8512">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8512">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8513">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8513">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8514">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8514">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8515">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8515">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8516">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8516">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8517">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8517">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8518">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8518">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8519">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8519">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8520">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8520">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8521">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8521">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8522">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8522">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8523">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8524">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8524">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8529">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8529">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8530">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8530">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8531">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8531">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8532">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8532">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8533">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8533">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8534">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8534">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8535">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8535">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8536">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8537">九位数或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8537">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8538">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8539">九位数字或 14 位号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8539">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8540">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8540">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8541">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8541">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8542">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8542">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8543">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8543">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8544">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8545">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8545">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8546">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8547">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8548">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8548">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8549">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8549">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8550">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8550">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8551">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8551">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8553">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8553">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8568">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8568">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8569">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8569">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8570">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8570">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8571">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8571">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8572">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8572">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8573">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8573">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8574">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8574">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8575">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8575">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8576">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8576">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8577">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8577">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8578">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8578">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8579">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8580">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8580">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8581">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8582">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8582">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8583">该  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8583">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8584">找到一个  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8584">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8614">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8614">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8615">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8616">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8616">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8617">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8618">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8618">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8619">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8620">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8621">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8622">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8623">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8623">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8624">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8624">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8644">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8644">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8645">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8645">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8646">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8646">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8647">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8647">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8648">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8648">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8649">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8649">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8650">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8650">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8651">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8651">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8652">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8652">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8653">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8653">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8654">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字，带特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8654">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8655">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8655">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8656">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8656">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8657">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8657">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8658">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8658">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8659">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8659">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8660">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8661">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8661">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8662">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8663">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8663">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8664">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8664">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8665">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8665">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8797">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8797">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8798">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8799">一个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8799">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8800">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8801">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8801">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8802">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8802">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8803">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8803">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8805">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8805">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8807">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8807">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8808">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8808">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8809">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8810">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8810">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8811">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8811">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8812">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8812">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8813">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8813">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8840">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8840">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8842">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8842">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8843">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8843">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8844">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8844">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8845">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8845">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8846">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8846">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8847">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8847">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8848">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8848">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8849">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8850">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8850">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8851">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8852">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8852">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8853">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8853">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8854">找到一个  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8854">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8855">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8855">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8856">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8856">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8881">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8881">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8882">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8882">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8883">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8883">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8884">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8884">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8885">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8885">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8886">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8886">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8887">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8887">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8888">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8888">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8889">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8889">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-8890">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8890">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-8891">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8891">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8892">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8892">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-8893">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-8893">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9021">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9021">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9022">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9022">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9023">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9023">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9024">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9024">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9025">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9025">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9026">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9026">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9027">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9027">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9028">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9028">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9029">13 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9029">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9030">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9030">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9031">1 位到 9 位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9031">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9032">表示 YYMMDD (出生日期的 6 个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9032">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9033">2 个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9033">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9034">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9034">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9035">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9035">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9036">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9036">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9037">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9037">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9038">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9038">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9039">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9039">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9040">找到一个  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9040">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9041">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9041">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9042">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9042">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9093">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9093">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9094">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9094">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9095">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9095">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9096">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9096">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9097">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9097">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9098">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9098">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9099">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9099">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9100">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9100">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9101">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9101">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9102">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9102">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9103">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9104">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例- 01 二月/二月 10) 或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9104">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9105">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9105">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9106">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9106">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9107">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9107">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9125">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9125">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9126">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9126">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9127">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9127">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9128">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9128">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9129">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9129">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9130">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9130">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9131">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9131">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9133">十位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9133">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9135">十位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9135">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9136">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9136">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9137">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9137">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9138">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9138">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9139">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9139">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9140">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9140">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9141">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9142">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9142">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9143">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9144">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9145">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9145">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9146">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9146">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9164">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9164">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9165">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9165">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9166">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9166">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9167">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9167">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9168">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9168">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9169">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9169">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9170">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9171">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9171">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9172">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9172">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9174">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9174">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9175">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9175">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9178">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9178">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9180">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9180">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9199">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9199">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9200">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9201">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9201">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9202">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9203">十个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9203">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9204">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9205">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9205">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9206">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9207">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9208">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9208">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9209">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9209">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9215">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9215">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9216">新加坡国家/ (身份证号码) NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9216">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9218">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9218">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9219">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9219">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9220">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9220">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9221">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9221">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9222">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9222">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9223">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9223">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9224">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9225">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9225">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9226">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9227">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9228">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9228">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9229">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9229">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9230">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9230">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9231">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9231">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9232">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9232">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9233">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9233">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9244">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9244">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9246">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9246">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9247">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9248">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9248">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9249">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9249">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9250">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9250">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9251">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9252">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9252">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9253">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9254">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9254">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9255">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9255">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9256">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9256">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
