## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9382">斯洛伐克个人编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9382">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9383">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9383">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9384">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9384">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9385">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9385">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9386">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9386">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9387">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9387">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9388">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9388">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9389">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9389">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9390">包含可选反反杠的九个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9390">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9391">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9391">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9392">6 个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9392">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9393">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9393">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9394">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9394">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9395">1 个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9395">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9397">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9399">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9400">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9400">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9401">找到一个  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9401">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9402">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9402">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9403">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9403">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9450">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9450">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9451">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9452">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9452">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9453">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9454">一个数字或字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9454">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9455">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9455">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9456">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9456">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9457">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9457">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9458">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9458">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9459">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9459">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9460">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9460">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9461">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9461">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9462">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9463">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9463">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9464">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9464">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9486">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9486">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9487">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9487">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9488">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9488">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9489">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9489">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9490">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9490">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9492">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9494">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9494">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9495">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9495">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9496">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9623">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9623">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9624">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9624">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9625">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9625">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9626">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9626">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9627">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9627">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9628">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9628">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9629">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9629">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9630">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9630">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9631">13 个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9631">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9632">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9632">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9633">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9633">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9634">对应于 DDMMLLL (的七个数字) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9634">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9635">对应于出生日期"50"的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9635">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9636">三个数字，对应于同一天（男性为 (000-499）和 500-999（对于男性）的性别和序列号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9636">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9637">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9637">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9638">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9639">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9639">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9640">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9641">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9641">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9642">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9642">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9643">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9643">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9644">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9644">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9645">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9645">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9673">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9673">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9675">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9675">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9676">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9677">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9677">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9678">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9678">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9679">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9679">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9680">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9680">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9681">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9681">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9682">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9682">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9683">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9683">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9684">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9684">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9685">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9685">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9686">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9687">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9687">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9688">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9689">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9689">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9690">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9690">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9713">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9713">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9714">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9715">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9716">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9717">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9718">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9719">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9721">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9721">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9722">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9722">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9723">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9723">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9724">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9724">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9725">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9725">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9726">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9727">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9727">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9728">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9729">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9730">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9730">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9731">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9731">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9732">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9732">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9733">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9733">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9757">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9757">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9758">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9758">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9759">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9759">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9760">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9760">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9761">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9761">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9762">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9762">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9763">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9763">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9764">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9764">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9765">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9765">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9766">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9766">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9767">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9768">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9768">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9769">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9770">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9770">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9771">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9771">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9772">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9772">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9773">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9773">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9779">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9779">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9781">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9781">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9783">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9783">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9784">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9784">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9785">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9785">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9786">由世纪和性别确定的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9786">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9787">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9787">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9788">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9788">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9789">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9789">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9790">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9791">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9791">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9792">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9793">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9793">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9794">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9794">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9795">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9795">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9796">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9797">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9797">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9798">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9798">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9799">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9799">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9800">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9800">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9801">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9801">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9803">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9803">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9804">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9804">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9805">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9805">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9806">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9806">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9807">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9807">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9808">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9808">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9809">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9809">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9810">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9810">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9811">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9811">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9812">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9812">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9813">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9813">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9814">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9815">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9815">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9816">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9817">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9817">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9818">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9818">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9819">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9819">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9820">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9820">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9821">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9821">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9955">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9955">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9956">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9956">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9957">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9957">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9958">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9958">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9959">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9959">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9960">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9960">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9961">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9961">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9962">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9962">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9963">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9963">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9964">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9964">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9965">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9965">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9966">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9966">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9967">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9967">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9968">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9968">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9969">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9970">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9970">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-9971">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9972">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9972">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9973">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9973">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9974">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9974">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-9975">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9975">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-9976">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-9976">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10000">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10000">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10001">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10002">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10002">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10003">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10004">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10004">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10005">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10005">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10006">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10006">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10007">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10007">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10008">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10009">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10009">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10010">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10011">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10011">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10012">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10012">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10013">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10013">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10014">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10014">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10015">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10016">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10016">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10017">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10017">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10046">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10046">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10047">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10047">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10048">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10048">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10049">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10049">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10050">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10050">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10051">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10051">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10052">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10052">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10053">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10053">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10054">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10054">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10055">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10055">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10056">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10056">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10057">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10057">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10058">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10058">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10059">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10059">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10060">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10060">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10061">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10061">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10062">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10062">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10063">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10063">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10064">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10064">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10065">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10065">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10066">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10066">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10067">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10067">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10068">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10068">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10069">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10069">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10070">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10070">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10071">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10072">指定模式中七个或八个数字以及一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10072">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10073">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10074">拥有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10074">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10075">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10075">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10076">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10076">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10077">没有西班牙国家身份证的非居民西班牙人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10077">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10078">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10078">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10079">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10079">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10080">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10080">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10081">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童居民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10081">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10082">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10082">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10083">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10083">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10084">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10084">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10085">具有一个百万美元标识号的百万美元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10085">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10086">一个区分大小写的大写字母"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10086">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10087">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10087">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10088">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10088">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10089">没有一个百万的标识号的亿元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10089">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10090">一个区分大小写的大写字母"M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10090">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10091">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10091">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10092">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10092">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10093">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10094">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10094">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10095">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10096">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10097">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10097">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10098">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10098">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10099">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10099">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10100">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10100">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10131">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10131">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10133">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10133">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10134">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10135">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10135">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10136">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10136">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10137">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10137">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10138">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10138">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10139">不是美元符号 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号为 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10139">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10140">7-128 个字符（不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10140">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10141">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10141">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10142">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10143">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10143">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10144">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10145">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10146">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10146">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10147">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter **关键字** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10147">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10148">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10148">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10149">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10149">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10150">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10150">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10151">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10151">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10177">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10177">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10178">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10178">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10179">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10179">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10180">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10180">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10181">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10181">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10182">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10182">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10183">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10183">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10184">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10184">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10185">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10186">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10186">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10187">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10188">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10188">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10189">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10189">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10190">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10190">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10323">瑞典国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10323">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10324">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10324">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10325">十个或 12 个数字和一个可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10325">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10326">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10326">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10327">10 位或 12 位以及可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10327">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10328">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10328">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10329">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10329">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10330">"-"或"+"分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10330">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10331">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10331">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10332">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10333">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10333">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10334">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10335">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10335">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10336">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10336">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10337">找到一个 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10337">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10338">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10338">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10339">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10339">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10340">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10340">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10341">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10341">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10360">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10360">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10361">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10361">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10362">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10362">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10363">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10363">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10364">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10364">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10365">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10365">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10366">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10367">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10367">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10368">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10369">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10369">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10370">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10370">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10371">下列情况之一为 true：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10371">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10372">找到搜索Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10372">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10373">找到Keyword_sweden_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10373">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10404">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10404">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10405">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10406">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10407">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10408">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10409">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10410">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10412">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10412">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10413">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10414">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10414">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10415">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10415">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10416">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10416">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10417">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10417">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10418">对于 1990 之前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或外种人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10418">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10419">第九个位置的数字表示性别（对于男性或甚至对于男性）为奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10419">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10420">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10420">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10421">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10422">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10422">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10423">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10424">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10424">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10425">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10425">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10426">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10426">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10427">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10427">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10428">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10428">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
