## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10454">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10454">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10456">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10456">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10458">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10458">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10459">四个字母银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10459">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10460">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10460">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10461">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10461">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10462">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10462">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10463">BBAN 代码的剩余部分 (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10463">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10464">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10464">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10465">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10465">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10466">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10466">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10467">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10468">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10468">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10469">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10469">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10506">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10506">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10507">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10507">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10508">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10508">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10509">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10509">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10510">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10510">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10511">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10511">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10512">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10512">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10513">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10514">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10514">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10515">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10516">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10516">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10517">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10517">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10518">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10518">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10519">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10519">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10520">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10520">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10521">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10521">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10522">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10522">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10523">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10523">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10524">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10525">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10525">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10526">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10527">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10527">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10528">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10528">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10529">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10529">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10530">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10530">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10531">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10531">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10552">台湾地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10552">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10553">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10553">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10554">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10554">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10555">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10555">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10556">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10556">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10557">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10557">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10558">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10558">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10559">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10559">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10560">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10560">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10561">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10561">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10562">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10562">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10563">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10563">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10564">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10564">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10565">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10565">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10566">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10566">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10567">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10567">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10568">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10568">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10569">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10569">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10582">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10582">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10585">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10585">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10586">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10586">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10587">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10587">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10588">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10588">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10589">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10589">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10590">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10590">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10591">生物识别护照号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10591">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10592">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10592">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10593">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10593">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10594">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10594">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10595">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10595">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10596">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10597">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10597">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10598">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10599">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10600">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10600">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10601">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10601">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10612">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10612">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10613">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10613">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10614">十个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10614">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10615">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10615">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10616">十个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10616">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10617">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10617">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10618">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10618">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10619">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10620">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10621">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10622">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10622">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10623">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10623">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10624">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10624">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10625">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10625">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10626">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10626">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10629">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10629">Resident Cert.</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10638">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10638">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10639">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10640">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10640">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10641">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10642">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10642">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10643">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10643">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10644">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10644">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10645">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10646">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10646">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10647">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10648">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10648">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10649">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10649">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10650">找到搜索Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10650">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10651">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10651">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10652">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10652">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10658">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10658">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10659">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10659">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10660">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10660">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10661">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10661">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10662">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10663">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10663">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10664">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10665">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10665">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10666">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10667">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10667">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10668">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10669">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10670">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10670">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10671">找到搜索Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10671">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10672">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10673">该函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10673">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10680">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10680">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10681">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10681">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10682">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10682">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10684">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10684">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10685">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10686">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10686">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10687">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10687">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10688">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10688">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10689">如果驱动程序是男性（即 51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12 位），则日期格式 MMDDY 中用于出生日期的 5 个数字 (第 7 个字符将递增 50) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10689">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10690">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10690">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10691">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10691">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10692">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10693">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10693">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10694">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10695">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10696">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10696">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10697">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10697">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10698">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10698">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10706">sidecar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10706">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10707">三周</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10707">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10708">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10708">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10709">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10709">photocard licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10715">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10715">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10716">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10716">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10717">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10717">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10718">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10719">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10719">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10720">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10721">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10721">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10722">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10723">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10723">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10724">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10725">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10725">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10726">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10726">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10727">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10727">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10729">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10729">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10734">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10734">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10735">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10735">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10737">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10737">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10738">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10739">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10739">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10740">三个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10740">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10741">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10741">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10742">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10742">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10743">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10743">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10744">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10744">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10745">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10746">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10746">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10747">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10748">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10749">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10749">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10750">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10750">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10751">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10751">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10752">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10752">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10753">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10753">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10754">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10754">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10772">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10772">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10773">NINO 国家/ (号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10773">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10774">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/区域标识号敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10774">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10776">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10776">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10777">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10778">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10778">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10779">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10779">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10780">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10780">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10781">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10781">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10782">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10782">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10783">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10783">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10784">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10784">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10785">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10785">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10786">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10786">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10787">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10787">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10788">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10788">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10789">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10789">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10790">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10790">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10791">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10791">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10792">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10793">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10793">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10794">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10795">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10795">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10796">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10796">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10797">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10797">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10798">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10798">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10799">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10799">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10821">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10821">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10822">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10822">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10823">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10824">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10825">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10826">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10827">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10828">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10830">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10830">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10831">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10832">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10832">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10833">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10834">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10834">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10835">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10836">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10836">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10837">该  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10837">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10838">找到一个  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10838">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10858">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10858">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10859">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10860">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10860">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10861">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10862">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10862">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10863">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10864">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10864">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10865">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10866">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10866">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10867">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10867">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10868">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10868">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10898">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10898">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10899">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10900">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10900">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10901">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10901">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10902">取决于州 - 例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10902">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10903">9 个数字，格式设置为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10903">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10904">9 个数字（如 dddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10904">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10905">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10906">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-10907">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10908">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10909">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10909">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10910">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10910">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10911">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10911">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-10912">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10912">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10913">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10913">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10914">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10914">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10915">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10915">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-10916">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-10916">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11014">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11014">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11016">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11016">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11018">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11018">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11019">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11019">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11020">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11020">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11021">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11021">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11022">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11022">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11023">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11023">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11024">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11024">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11025">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11025">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11026">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11026">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11027">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11027">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11028">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11028">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11029">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11029">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11030">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11030">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11031">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11032">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11032">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11033">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11034">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11034">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11035">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11035">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11036">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11036">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11037">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11037">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11038">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11038">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11039">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11039">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11040">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11040">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11041">该函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11041">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11042">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11042">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11043">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11043">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11044">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11044">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11045">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11045">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11046">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11046">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11047">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11047">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11048">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11048">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11049">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11049">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11052">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11052">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11053">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11053">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11054">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11054">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11055">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11055">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11056">SSN (美国社会保险号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11056">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11057">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11058">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11058">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11059">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11059">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11060">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11061">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11061">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11062">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11062">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11063">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11063">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11064">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11064">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11065">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11065">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11066">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11067">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11067">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11068">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11069">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11069">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11070">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11070">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11071">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11071">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11072">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11073">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11073">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11074">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11074">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11075">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11075">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11076">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11076">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11077">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11077">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11078">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11078">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11079">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11079">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11080">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11080">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11095">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11095">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11096">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11096">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11097">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11097">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11098">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11098">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11099">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11099">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11100">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11100">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11101">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11101">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11102">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11102">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11103">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11104">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11104">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11105">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11106">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11106">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11107">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11107">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11108">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11108">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11129">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11129">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11130">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11130">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11131">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11131">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11132">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11132">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11133">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11133">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11134">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11134">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11135">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11135">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11136">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11136">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11137">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11137">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11138">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11138">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11139">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11139">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11140">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11140">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11141">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11141">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11142">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11142">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11143">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11143">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11144">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11144">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11145">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11145">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11155">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11155">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11156">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11156">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11157">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11157">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11158">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11158">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11159">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11159">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11160">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11160">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11161">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11162">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11162">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11163">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11164">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11164">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11165">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11165">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11166">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11166">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11167">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11167">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11168">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11168">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd049-11169">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11169">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd049-11170">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，可以检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11170">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11171">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11171">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="cd049-11172">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd049-11172">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
